code_sample:
def run_packing():
    n=26
    rng=np.random.default_rng()
    # Generate initial best via several starts
    start_funcs = [start_hex, start_grid, start_random_08, start_random_09]
    best_sum=-1.0
    best_centers=None
    for func in start_funcs:
        centers0=func(n,rng)
        radii0=solve_radii_lp(centers0)
        sum0=radii0.sum()
        if sum0>best_sum:
            best_sum=sum0
            best_centers=centers0
    # Improvement cycles:
    for cycle in range(12):
        # apply hill climb
        new_centers, new_sum = hill_climb_lp(best_centers, rng,
                                             max_iters=2500,
                                             init_sigma=0.07)
        if new_sum > best_sum + 1e-9:
            best_sum, best_centers = new_sum, new_centers
        # if already above target, break
        if best_sum >= 2.636:
            break
        # occasional random restart
        if cycle % 4 == 3:
            rnd_centers = start_random_09(n, rng)
            new_centers2, new_sum2 = hill_climb_lp(rnd_centers, rng,
                                                   max_iters=2500,
                                                   init_sigma=0.07)
            if new_sum2 > best_sum:
                best_sum, best_centers = new_sum2, new_centers2
        # gradually reduce sigma? Not needed.
    # Final refinement with smaller sigma
    final_centers, final_sum = hill_climb_lp(best_centers, rng,
                                            max_iters=3000,
                                            init_sigma=0.03)
    if final_sum > best_sum:
        best_sum=final_sum
        best_centers=final_centers
    # Compute radii
    final_radii = solve_radii_lp(best_centers)
    final_sum = final_radii.sum()
    # shrink
    final_radii = np.maximum(final_radii - 1e-8, 0.0)
    final_sum = float(final_radii.sum())
    return best_centers, final_radii, final_sum
